description: React component 'MoviesList' that displays, edits, and deletes movies with real-time updates via Supabase subscriptions. It fetches movies from a service, manages local state, sets up real-time PostgreSQL change listeners, and provides inline editing functionality.

methods.name: MoviesList()
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of movies, allowing inline editing and deletion, with real-time synchronization.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a movie by id, updates local state optimistically, and reverts on error.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Sets the component into edit mode for a specific movie, allowing inline editing of its title.

methods.name: cancelEdit
methods.description: Cancels editing mode and resets editing state.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves the edited movie title locally and attempts to update it on the server.
